Floating Buildings: Buildings would float in the air, creating a scene reminiscent of a science fiction movie.
Airplanes Flying Upside Down: Airplanes would fly upside down, as they would be moving against the force of gravity.
Swimming in the Air: People would be able to swim in the air, as the water would be attracted to the ground instead of falling to the ground.
Upside-Down Trees: Trees would grow upwards, with their roots reaching towards the sky.
Reverse Waterfall: Waterfalls would flow upwards, creating a stunning and unusual sight.
